attributes.action: For all open air car parks in England to have solar panels installed over them
attributes.additional_details: Doing this to all open air car parks is cheaper then buying up land to put solar panels or wind farms on them, the car parks are already there, why not use them?
attributes.background: For all open air car parks in England to have solar panels installed over them

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701293
